title: 如何评价中共官媒引导战螂攻击海外华裔记者？
contents:
Jiayang Fan： I’ve evidently become target of massive campaign on Chinese social media. My crimes are everything to moving to the US, supporting democracy,writing abt China,writing abt HK,most disturbingly I’m “disgusting Bc she likes black people.” The rage here is frightening& disheartening
https://twitter.com/JiayangFan/status/1248880628302516224


ps. 战螂现在还在该Twitter下对这名海外华裔记者进行密集的人身攻击
